content.heading: <select> Tag
paragraphs: The <select> tag creates a drop-down list.

Example: <label for="cars">Choose a car:</label>
<select name="cars" id="cars">
  <option value="volvo">Volvo</option>
  <option value="saab">Saab</option>
</select>

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Used in forms to collect user input.
Requires name attribute for form submission and id for label association.

content.heading: Examples
paragraphs:
With optgroup: <select name="cars" id="cars">
  <optgroup label="Swedish Cars">
    <option value="volvo">Volvo</option>
  </optgroup>
</select>
